item.val: Marine House SEASIR CHIBISI Booking Form

Please key in this phone number for car NAVI system 098 869 6329 or this MAP CODE - 33246627*42
Note * For own transport please be at our SEASIR NAHA before 08:00 for AM trip or 13:00 for PM trip. We do provide FREE car parking space.

You will receive a PayPal deposit request from SEASIR LTD. account, to secure your booking please make your deposit of JPY3,000 per person within 3 days start from the day you receive deposit request from our PayPal account, or within 24 hours if your booking request is less than 3 days notice from the departure date. All booking request will cancel if no deposit receive.
